data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Bogovinje to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bogovinje, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Bogovinje a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Bogovinje that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Bogovinje who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Albanian, Macedonian people.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Bogovinje do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 11 believers in Bogovinje and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bogovinje, North Macedonia has a population of 6,400.

We estimate Bogovinje has 11 people who might know Jesus, 3,956 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,434 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 581 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 3,956 people in the state of Bogovinje who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.
